title: Title — hgraphr
code: df = data.frame( x = factor(state.name[1:18]), y = runif(18) ) hgraphr(df) #> Error in aes(xmin = -Inf, xmax = Inf, ymin = 0.5, ymax = 0.8): could not find function "aes"
